description:
### Concatenate Arrays

Create a function that concatenates two arrays and return the resulting array. The function is expected to take in two integer arrays and will simply combine both into one array.

Input: Two arrays (a, b)
Output: A new array containing all the elements from a and b

Example:

``` concatenateArrays([1, 2], [3, 4]) // [1, 2, 3, 4] ```
